AdministrationBuilding.text: A student mistakes you for the bursar. If you want to carry on the deception, make a Will (-2) check. If you pass, gain $8 in ill-gotten tuition money. If you fail, you"re arrested and taken to the Police Station.

ScienceBuilding.text: You find a student pounding on a strange device that he has hooked up to massive machinery. He states that it is a dimensional beam machine. If you offer to help him, make a Lore (-2) check. If you pass, beams shoots out in all directions, disrupting the gates open throughout the board. Roll a die for each open gate one at a time. On a success the gate is closed. However, you may not take it as a trophy, but instead return it to the pile of gate markers. If you fail, the machinery overheats and explodes. Roll a die and lose that much Stamina, then move to St. Mary"s Hospital.

Library.text: Pass a luck (-2) check to find $5 someone was using as a bookmark
